alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:52PM CDT until May 10 at 10:21AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. Big River at Byrnesville. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. Bourbeuse River at Union. Meramec River near Arnold. Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River at Fenton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bourbeuse River at Union. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.4 feet, East Main Street is closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 21.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM CDT Saturday was 21.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Bourbeuse River Union 15.0 21.9 20.0 9.3 5.9 4.7 3.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
